song.title: Jesus I Come
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .G Bm D A
[1] . G D Oh how I need Your grace . G D More than my words can say . Bm G Jesus I come, Jesus I come || . G D In all my weaknesses . G D You are my Comforter . Bm G Jesus I come, Jesus I come
[C] . G Bm I will rise, stand redeemed . D/F# A Heaven open over me . G Bm To Your name, eternally . D/F# A Endless glory I will bring ---
[2] . G D Oh what amazing love . G D We need Your cleansing flood . Bm G Jesus I come, Jesus I come || . G D In every broken place . G D You are my righteousness . Bm G Jesus I come, Jesus I come
[Instrumental] .D - A - Em - Bm - G - D
[B] .D A Em Bm Thank You, Jesus .G D Just as I am, I come .D A Em Bm Hallelujah .G A D Oh what amazing love
